name: FLORIDA BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Educating Members of Congress and policymakers on the SBAs CDC/504 program and its importance for COVID-19 recovery measures and relevant legislation aimed at supporting small business lending.
